alert.note: Alert for Gibson; Knox (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 8:48PM EST until December 25 at 8:00PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana... White River at Petersburg. White River at Elliston. White River at Hazleton. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Youngs Creek at Amity. East Fork White River at Seymour. White River at Edwardsport. .Rainfall of 1 to 2 inches from Friday night into Saturday caused minor flooding to develop along portions of the White River and the East Fork White River in southern parts of central Indiana. Flooding may persist into Christmas Eve for portions of the White River. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River at Hazleton. * WHEN...From Sunday evening to Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Floodwaters cover much low ground in agricultural season. Low lying oil fields...Pottsville Road and possibly a few other low rural roads flood. High water isolates Pottstown, a river cabin community. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river will fall to 15.2 feet and then begin rising tomorrow morning. It will then rise above flood stage tomorrow evening to 18.1 feet early Tuesday morning. It will fall to 17.4 feet and then begin rising Wednesday morning. It will then rise again to 18.1 feet Thursday evening. It will fall below flood stage Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued Sunday morning by around 1100 AM EST /1000 AM CST/.
